channel.title: Client Crashes When I Spawn Some Items
channel.description:
Heyy everyone who reads this =d. I've made a 562 loading 643, and for some reason when I spawn a Korasi Sword, or Master Dungeoneering Cape, my Client crashes.. I have no idea why, I've been away from RSPS for a while, so please.. don't call me a noob programmer.
I'm good in following instructions on how too solve this.. and I'll rep whoever ;p. (Yes the Cache is working because it tests' the ID's put into the 562 Cache, example, 18764 - Korasis' Sword.
But erm, any help would be naice.. Ty whoever tries X\. >8D
EDIT: I've modified the Equip ID for it, and the itemdefinitions.xml , I added the proper ints, ect..
Someone please reply x\.
EDIT: Nevermind I fixed it.. ty everyone for all ur fucking help, i see why everyone that ik asks me too join rl or r-s.. =.=".

item.title: Client Crashes When I Spawn Some Items
item.dc:creator: @sabbi sabbi
item.description:
@sabbi wrote:

[quote=“blckranger11, post:3, topic:405962”]lol try using a different client…
Sabbi do you have teamviewer?[/quote]im running it on 317 and ive been working on this source for weeks n.o.t gonna change client now. anyways im getting help on sagi x.evolution page but thanks.

Read full topic
